com.basho.riak.client.core

Class RiakCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.RiakCluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeStateListener, OperationRetrier

    public class RiakCluster
extends Object
implements OperationRetrier, NodeStateListener
    A modeled Riak Cluster.

    This class represents a Riak Cluster upon which operations are executed. Instances are created using the RiakCluster.Builder

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Brian Roach

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RiakCluster.Builder
      Builder used to create RiakCluster instances.

      • addNode

        public void addNode(RiakNode node)
             throws UnknownHostException
        Adds a RiakNode to this cluster. The node can not have been started nor have its Bootstrap or Executor asSet.
        Parameters:
        node - the RiakNode to add
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if the RiakNode's hostname cannot be resolved
        IllegalArgumentException - if the node's Bootstrap or Executor are already asSet.

      • removeNode

        public boolean removeNode(RiakNode node)
        Removes the provided node from the cluster.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        true if the node was in the cluster, false otherwise.

      • getNodes

        public List<RiakNode> getNodes()

        A copy of the list of RiakNodes

      • registerNodeStateListener

        public void registerNodeStateListener(NodeStateListener listener)
        Register a NodeStateListener.

        Any state change by any of the nodes in the cluster will be sent to the registered NodeStateListener.

        When registering, the current state of all the nodes is sent to the listener.

        Parameters:
        listener - The NodeStateListener to register.

      • removeNodeStateListener

        public void removeNodeStateListener(NodeStateListener listener)
        Remove a NodeStateListener.

        The supplied NodeStateListener will be unregistered and no longer receive state updates.

        Parameters:
        listener - The NodeStateListener to unregister.

        public static RiakCluster.Builder builder(List<RiakNode> nodes)
